rows.label: bf03350100_0010
rows.name: Coming in, old man.

rows.label: bf03350100_0020
rows.name: Hey hey, hasn't your collection grown again?

rows.label: bf03350100_0030
rows.name: Oh. Don't criticize other people's hobbies.

rows.label: bf03350100_0040
rows.name: That's no way to treat a war buddy!

rows.label: bf03350100_0050
rows.name: War buddy?

rows.label: bf03350100_0060
rows.name:
Yeah, before forming the mercenary group, 
I was freelance.

rows.label: bf03350100_0070
rows.name:
In our youth, old man Cole and 
I ran around various battlefields.

rows.label: bf03350100_0080
rows.name:
Thanks to someone who'd always work for free 
due to sentimentality, we never made any money.

rows.label: bf03350100_0090
rows.name:
Ha ha ha, we're both guilty of it. 
You went and started a theater troupe.

rows.label: bf03350100_0100
rows.name: Hmph. Well, what can I do for you, friend?

rows.label: bf03350100_0110
rows.name:
Old man, you've lived quite 
a long time, haven't you?

rows.label: bf03350100_0120
rows.name:
Don't you know? The way to cross 
to the World Tree... the path to Eden.

rows.label: bf03350100_0130
rows.name: Eden? What would you do there? That place...

rows.label: bf03350100_0140
rows.name: That Core Crystal... y-you are...

rows.label: bf03350100_0150
rows.name: If you've awakened, then the Driver is...

rows.label: bf03350100_0160
rows.name: That's me.

rows.label: bf03350100_0170
rows.name: You... no way... a child...

rows.label: bf03350100_0180
rows.name: How about it, old man? Do you know the way or not?

rows.label: bf03350100_0190
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: bf03350100_0200
rows.name:
The fact that you came asking about how to cross 
to the World Tree means you've tried going once, right?

rows.label: bf03350100_0210
rows.name: Yeah... But we couldn't make it.

rows.label: bf03350100_0220
rows.name:
Of course. As long as that thing is there, 
not a single person can cross to the World Tree.

rows.label: bf03350100_0230
rows.name: It's protecting the World Tree.

rows.label: bf03350100_0240
rows.name:
However... once, there was just one person 
who climbed the World Tree and went to meet God.

rows.label: bf03350100_0250
rows.name: There was...? Really?

rows.label: bf03350100_0260
rows.name:
Yes. That man might know about that thing 
and how to cross to the World Tree.

rows.label: bf03350100_0270
rows.name: Who was it?

rows.label: bf03350100_0280
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf03350100_0290
rows.name: Cole-san, please tell me. I absolutely must go to Eden.

rows.label: bf03350100_0300
rows.name:
I can tell you, but before that, 
would you let me speak with her alone?

rows.label: bf03350100_0310
rows.name: With the Holy Grail, I mean.

rows.label: bf03350100_0320
rows.name: With Homura?

rows.label: bf03350100_0330
rows.name: I understand.

rows.label: bf03350100_0340
rows.name: Please, through here.

rows.label: bf03350100_0350
rows.name:
Cole-san, right?
You wrote that play, didn't you?

rows.label: bf03350100_0360
rows.name: I'm sorry. Did I make you remember?

rows.label: bf03350100_0370
rows.name: No, It was very...nostalgic.

rows.label: bf03350100_0380
rows.name: Heh, don't force yourself. I'm truly sorry.

rows.label: bf03350100_0390
rows.name: I wanted to leave a record of that time.

rows.label: bf03350100_0400
rows.name:
Show people how we were back in those days...
Really get it across to them...

rows.label: bf03350100_0410
rows.name: Will you use it again? That power.

rows.label: bf03350100_0420
rows.name: I don't know yet.

rows.label: bf03350100_0430
rows.name: This world won't be able to endure it a second time.

rows.label: bf03350100_0440
rows.name:
I understand. If possible, 
I'd like to avoid using it.

rows.label: bf03350100_0450
rows.name:
This is what I hope for...
But...

rows.label: bf03350100_0460
rows.name: Only "that man" knows the way to the World Tree.

rows.label: bf03350100_0470
rows.name: Do you think you can make it to him?

rows.label: bf03350100_0480
rows.name: I just wanted to make sure.

rows.label: bf03350100_0490
rows.name: Of course. If that is to be my destiny.

rows.label: bf03350100_0500
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: bf03350100_0510
rows.name: That boy who's with you...

rows.label: bf03350100_0520
rows.name: His name is Rex. He's a very energetic and kind person.

rows.label: bf03350100_0530
rows.name: Reminds me of a certain someone...

rows.label: bf03350100_0540
rows.name: Heh.

rows.label: bf03350100_0550
rows.name: Okay then. I'll help you out.

rows.label: bf03350100_0560
rows.name: Thank you... Minoth-san!

rows.label: bf03350100_0570
rows.name:
Minoth...
I'd almost forgotten that name...
